transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan bolo, mujhe aawaj aa rahi hai aap clear?
Customer: Hello, Manish, haan, haan, abhi aawaj aa rahi hai? Ji, aa rahi hai, aapki clear aawaj.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai? Achcha, achcha, theek hai. Main ye bol rahi hu ki jo aap buylead consume kar rahe ho, woh bulk wala filter laga ke karte ho?
Customer: Humko kuch malum nahi hai isliye toh hum bol rahe hai ki ek baar ek baar aake mere ko samjhaya jaaye toh hum kya karna hai, kya nahi karna hai, kuch malum pade. Ye toh chalu ho gaya baad mein paisa karna nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha, achcha. Nahi sir, woh maine welcome call mein aapko bataya tha na ki aap bulk wala filter laga ke kar sakte ho. Agar nahi aap bhul gaye ho toh main aapko dobara bhi video mein bata sakti hu.
Customer: Video call se nahi karna hai madam, ek baar kisi ko bhej doge toh video call mein yaad nahi rehta hai, dopahar mein teen-char log ka chaap hai sabko samjha denge ek baar aayega toh. Aap mere ko samjhao, video call se alag-alag dikkat ho jaata hai.
Executive: Achcha, achcha. Ye bandhani...
Customer: Nahi, humne jab kiya na chalu, usko clear bola hi tha ki teen-char baar aana padega meri dukaan pe samjhane ke liye aapko properly kyunki video call wala humne system hi nahi hai, video call mein samajhna nahi aata kuch humko. Ek baar dukaan pe aa ke samjhaya jaaye properly sab toh malum pad jaayega baad mein.
Executive: Achcha, toh jo woh isme jo dusra number hai woh bhi isko handle kar rahe hai jo aapne dusra number diya hua hai?
Customer: Haan, dono handle toh dono kar rahe hai par dono mein lead proper sahi aa raha hai sab ek tarikh ka, do tarikh ka lead aa raha hai woh ek do tarikh ka hum kaam nahi karte toh mein matlab kya lead ka iska?
Executive: Nahi, woh main batati hu sir kya problem aa rahi hai. Aapke paas aa toh rahi hai lekin bas ye hai abhi aapko sahi se use karna nahi aa raha hai. Jaise main yaha pe agar dekhu bulk wala filter laga ke toh agar main yaha pe check kar rahi hu toh aapko 50-50 hazaar se ek-ek lakh tak ki bhi buylead aapke paas aayi hui hai. Ye bandhani Jaipur...
Customer: Pehle pehle hamari item dekho, hamari item kya hai usme kya lead aayegi dekho.
Executive: Dekhiye lead toh aapke paas aa rahi hai.
Customer: Bandhani Jaipur mein hamara only bandhani, hamara bandhani saari ka kaam hai woh bandhani only saari ka lead aaya toh bhi matlab nahi humko.
Executive: Bandhani saari ka aapka kaam hai ya nahi hai? Hai na?
Customer: Bandhani saari ka hi kaam hai mera, only bandhani saari ka hi hai.
Executive: Toh wahi main bata rahi hu dekho bandhani Jaipur special saari karke ek buylead aayi hui hai aur unko jo quantity chahiye 300 piece aur jo unko jo order value hai woh 50 lakh se 1 lakh tak ka hai.
Customer: 50 hazaar se 1 lakh tak ka, 300 piece?
Executive: Haan, toh lekin aur 50 hazaar se 1 lakh tak ka toh isko 300 piece chahiye aur 50 hazaar se 1 lakh chahiye toh kitna rupaye ka? Mere paas itna woh saari hi nahi hai. Main kaise le aaunga isko?
Customer: Kitna chahiye aapko minimum? Kitna?
Customer: Mera koi bhi saari minimum 700-800 rupaye starting hai.
Executive: Toh 800 ke hisab se bhi mera 700 rupaye ban rahi hai. Main aise woh lead leke main kya karunga? 200-200 wali saari toh mere paas ka nahi hai.
Executive: Toh woh toh sir aapko baat karke pata chalega na unse. Jaise is tarah ki buylead aapke paas aayi hui hai. Aapne padh ke ye toh andaza laga liya na ki inko bulk mein chahiye. Ab jab aap buylead consume karke unse baat karoge.
Customer: Usme jo amount likha hai woh bhi aap dekh lete hai isko 1 lakh mein tumne 300 saari chahiye. Toh kaun si aayegi saari? Mere paas 300 wali saari nahi hai sir. Mere paas toh 1 lakh mein 300 saari ke liye mere paas minimum 4 lakh rupaye chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Nahi woh aapki baat hai, woh aap unko...
Executive: Haan, nahi woh na aapko unse influence karna padega. Thodi bargaining dekhiye har marketing mein hoti hai. Woh kam batayenge, aap thoda jyada bologe toh woh thoda upar niche hoke tab jaake ek point pe aate hai.
Customer: Haan, woh toh baat karne ke, haan woh toh baat karne ke baad sab chalega. Agar aap apni offline shop bhi chalate hai toh waha bilkul fixed price thodi hogi, bargaining hoti hai.
Executive: Bargaining hota nahi hai dukaan mein hamare idhar. Retail dukaan nahi hamara, wholesale dukaan hai. Nahi fixed karenge.
Executive: Haan, toh fixed price hai aapke?
Customer: Nahi fixed karenge, manufacturer mein kabhi bargaining koi nahi karta hai madam.
Executive: Achcha, haan toh woh bhi aap unko bata sakte ho. Aap unke dekho jab bhi aap kisi buyer se baat karoge aur woh paiso ka jaha bhi baat hoti hai, aap unki competition se bhi baat kar sakte ho ki sir aap dekho agar ye saari mein itne ki bech raha hu toh aap kisi aur pe loge toh woh bhi aapko itne ki dega ya isse jyada ki dega. Theek hai? Aap unko dikha sakte ho ki aap kahi...
Executive: Haan, aap kahi bhi jaoge, aap dekho ek baar aap bhi khud bhi dekho ki aapke jo competition hai unhone kitna price rakha hua hai in wali saari ka jo aap bechte ho. Is wajah se aap na bol sakte ho unko. Aap mujhe ek baar batao main ek-ek buylead ka discuss karti hu. Baaki jo aapne mujhe bola ki unhone aapko physical meeting ke liye bola tha ek baar main uske bare mein baat karke aapse sir se main phir batati hu. Warna hamare yaha pe bhi system ho chuka hai ki...
Customer: Ek baar aap mere ko video call mein...
Customer: Nahi ek baar aap usko bhejoge toh main pura samajh lunga kya hai system kaisa hai ek baar. Woh ek baar aake gaya pehle starting mein starting jab humne nahi kiya tha na tab toh ek do baar aake gaya. Baad mein starting karne ke baad ek mahine ke baad koi nahi aaya abhi tak. Humne char-paanch baar call bhi kiya isko. Ek baar mere ko samajhne mein baad mein kya baad mein aap mere ko samjhaoge na toh mere ko idea bhi kuch aa jayega. Abhi mere ko aap bologe toh sab upar se jayega mere ko. Kyunki jab tak mere ko iska pura knowledge nahi hai toh offline bhi nahi samajh raha toh online kaise samjhunga main. Abhi aap samajh sakte ho na jab tak itna nahi clear ho jaunga na.
Customer: Jab tak nahi clear ho jaunga na iska system kya hai.
Executive: Theek hai main na ek baar baat karke sir se ki aapko kisi ne aise comment comment kiya tha ki woh offline aayenge toh main ek baar unse baat karke aapko.
Customer: Woh toh bol raha tha 20 baar bola 20 baar aayega. Hamara idhar baaju mein office hai aap jitni baar bologe utni baar bhej dunga. Hamara accounting support milega ye support milega sab kuch bol raha tha ye toh. Main aapko number bhi bhej sakta hu.
Executive: Haan mujhe whatsapp pe aap unka number send kar dijiye whatsapp pe.
Customer: Dono ka number send karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji, haan mujhe whatsapp pe number send kar dijiye main baat karke aapko bata dungi. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Okay, okay.
Executive: Okay sir, okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs physical assistance to understand system.

- Expresses concern about irrelevant buyleads.

- Wants leads relevant to bandhani sarees only.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to discuss buyleads individually.

- Executive will inquire about physical meeting request.

- Executive requested customer to share contact details on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up after internal discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, physical assistance, product relevance
